content.text: Hi, I love huge paintings. I also like collecting rocks and love zumba. I'm a fan of collectible dragon ball z figures. I love the smell of beans. What are some of your interests?
Hi, I like steak, I only listen to opera, I wake up at 4am every day, I have never been to Canada, and I live in a condo.

I love steak too! I've never been to opera, but I've heard good things. I'm not a morning person so I can't imagine getting up at 4am every day. I've never been to Canada either. I used to live in a condo, but I now live in a house.

That's cool. I'm glad you like steak. Opera is really good, you should give it a try. I'm not really a morning person either, but I've found that it helps me to get a jump on the day. I've always wanted to go to Canada, but I've never had the chance. I like living in a condo, it's small and easy to take care of.

I'll have to give opera a try sometime. I'm glad that you've found something that works for you in the morning. I'm sure you'll get to Canada someday. I like condos too, they're great for people who are busy and don't have a lot of time to take care of a house.

Yeah, I think you'll like opera. It's really beautiful and inspiring. I'm glad that I'm able to get up early in the morning, it really helps me to be productive. I know I'll get to Canada eventually, I just have to save up some money first. I think condos are great for people who are busy and don't have a lot of time to take care of a house.
